meanings.definition: Capable of being extended or stretched.
meanings.sent1: The rubber band was extensile, allowing it to stretch easily.
meanings.sent2: The extensile rope could reach the bottom of the well.
meanings.sent3: The extensile balloon kept expanding until it popped.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was as extensile as a rubber band, always able to stretch a little more.
meanings.sent5: The extensile fabric of the hammock made it comfortable for all body types.

meanings.definition: Able to be expanded or enlarged.
meanings.sent1: The extensile table could accommodate more guests when extended.
meanings.sent2: The extensile suitcase held all her belongings when expanded.
meanings.sent3: The extensile garden seemed to grow larger every time we visited.
meanings.sent4: His extensile knowledge of history allowed him to understand various cultures.
meanings.sent5: The extensile wings of the bird enabled it to soar high in the sky.

meanings.definition: Having the quality of elasticity or flexibility.
meanings.sent1: The extensile rubber band snapped back into place after being stretched.
meanings.sent2: The extensile branches of the tree swayed gently in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The extensile dancer moved gracefully across the stage.
meanings.sent4: His extensile mind could adapt to new ideas quickly.
meanings.sent5: The extensile yoga mat provided comfort during various stretches.
